column2: turn my thermostat to NUMBER_0 f as soon as it stops raining here
column3: edge ( monitor ( @org.thingpedia.weather.current param:location:Location = location:current_location ) ) on not param:status:Enum(raining,cloudy,sunny,snowy,sleety,drizzling,windy) == enum:raining => @thermostat.set_target_temperature param:value:Measure(C) = NUMBER_0 unit:F

column2: when there is a new article published in the washington posts powerpost blog i want an update
notify me if case latest posts on an rss feed update
when i get my gmail play URL_0 on my lg tv
column3: monitor ( @com.gmail.inbox ) on new param:email_id:Entity(com.gmail:email_id) => @com.lg.tv.webos2.play_url param:url:Entity(tt:url) = URL_0

column2: if the fog is exactly at NUMBER_0 , alert me with updates in weather in LOCATION_0
column3: edge ( monitor ( @org.thingpedia.weather.current param:location:Location = LOCATION_0 ) ) on param:fog:Number == NUMBER_0 => notify

column2: when the washington post everything blog has a new post lower speaker volume
when my security camera feed updates notify me
i want GENERIC_ENTITY_tt:stock_id_0 stocks whenever someone uploads a new photo .
announce the texts that were sent to me
message me if there is an update to xkcd and the alt text is different than QUOTED_STRING_0
column3: edge ( monitor ( @com.xkcd.get_comic ) ) on not param:alt_text:String == QUOTED_STRING_0 => notify

column2: notify me when the weather in LOCATION_0 changes or updates
